definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Previous research on the definite article has been conventionally confined to the sentential level of language.
sentences.chinese: 传统的英语定冠词研究是在句子的层面上进行的。

sentences.english: how far is it from here to there?
sentences.chinese: 这是对的，谁说there前面不能加定冠词了？

sentences.english: Today we'll have listening practice. After that we'll sum up the usages of the definite article.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们先做听力练习，然后总结定冠词的用法。

sentences.english: Don't leave out the definite article.
We can't use the indefinite article with this noun.
sentences.chinese: 我们不可以在这个名词前用不定冠词。

sentences.english: To recognize and use the indefinite articles to talk about things that are countable.
sentences.chinese: 识别并使用不定冠词谈论可数名词。

sentences.english: And the use of these is just the same as the definite articles.
sentences.chinese: 那前置词的用法和定冠词是一样的。

sentences.english: Read the passage again. Put a line under the words a and the.
sentences.chinese: 重读课文，划出不定冠词和定冠词。

sentences.english: Read the passage again. Put a line under the words a and the.
sentences.chinese: 重读课文，划出不定冠词和定冠词。

sentences.english: You should use the definite article in the sentence.
sentences.chinese: 在这个句子中你应该用定冠词。

sentences.english: I claim that the definite article takes up the head position of D.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为，定冠词位于限定词的中心语位置。

sentences.english: Learners use of the definite article is an important index of their English language proficiency.
sentences.chinese: 定冠词使用是表明学习者英语水平的一个重要指标。

definition: countable noun (in grammar of European languages)
determiner (in grammar, i.e. article, demonstrative, possessive pronoun, noun genitive etc)
